MCQ: What is the focus of the workshop on Generative AI at AIMLSystems?
Choices: a: Building and deploying Generative AI systems | b: Developing new AI algorithms | c: Exploring the ethics of AI | d: Applications of AI in healthcare

MCQ: Which of the following is not a topic of interest for the workshop?
Choices: a: Systems, architecture and infrastructure for Generative AI | b: Machine learning and Modeling using LLMs and Diffusion models | c: Natural Language Processing | d: Deployment of Generative AI solutions

MCQ: What is one of the applications of Large Language Models (LLMs)?
Choices: a: Text generation | b: Image generation | c: Video generation | d: All of the above

MCQ: What is one of the ethical concerns associated with Generative AI?
Choices: a: Fairness | b: Transparency | c: Accountability | d: All of the above

MCQ: What is one of the ways to evaluate the performance of Generative AI models?
Choices: a: Human evaluation | b: Automatic evaluation | c: Both human and automatic evaluation | d: None of the above
